name: Weird Haircut !!!
description:
If you're ready for a simple and fun game, your customers are waiting for you!

This game is inspired by the masters of hair cut and massage who do their job in odd ways. Use strange tools like ax and fire for haircuts, wax and massage after haircut make your customers happy. Not forgetting to say, you will find much more than a haircut in the game.
publishers: CUBE GAMES YAZILIM SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
